about_the_game:
Uh oh! Viewers are dropping!

Become renowned funny-man live streamer Jerma985 in this upcoming free genre-jumping adventure!

It is up to you to appease the restless live chat audience and climb your way up to internet-clown fame.

Hop between multiple in-universe video games—including snippets from the RPG "Paper Jerma" and the psychological horror game "Peep the Horror"—to quench the ravenous hunger of the chat.

Hijinks will ensue.

FEATURES


  • Silly references to Jerma985 and the extended Jermaverse
  • Turn-based "Paper Jerma" RPG gameplay with timing-based attacks
  • First-person psychological horror
  • Clown-based vehicular combat
  • Blackjack (with a rat)
  • "Story" and "characters" and "jokes"
  • A large amount of Jerma noises
  • Is free
  • Rats

Disclaimer: This game is unaffiliated with Jerma985, was not commissioned by him, and does not represent his views. This is a completely free fan-project made for fun by fans.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These system requirements are just the default system requirements given for Unity 2021 apps.

short_description: Become Jerma. In this genre-jumping absurdist adventure, scramble to appease a restless livestream audience by hopping between in-universe video games. Enter the Jermaverse...
